app.js > MainCtrl
-----------------
Change $scope.apiUrl = 'http://dev.syntrio.in/cliffvault/'; >> To live domain
Change $scope.imageUrl = 'http://dev.syntrio.in/cliffvault/app/resources/images/'; >> To live domain


Index.html
-----------------
<script>
    var apiUrl = 'http://dev.syntrio.in/cliffvault/'; >> To live domain
</script>
